title: Richard D. Krugman, MD, School of Medicine Dean's Endowed Chair
description: To provide support for the Dean's Chair and activities associated with the University of Colorado School of Medicine on the Anschutz Medical Campus in honor of Richard D. Krugman, MD.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Dean's Chair and activities associated with the University of Colorado School of Medicine on the Anschutz Medical Campus in honor of Richard D. Krugman, MD.
